attributes.action: Put violent paedophile Jaimi watt back in prison and away from our children
attributes.background:
Jaimi Watt committed an "appalling act of violence" on a two-year-old, 
Watt admitted assaulting the child by punching her on the head, biting and scratching her and sexually abusing her. The DR who treated her said it was the worst genital injuries he had ever seen in a child or adult

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Sentencing is the responsibility of the courts, not the UK Government and Parliament.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, so that there is a higher minimum sentence for crimes of this type, you could start a new petition calling for that.
